title: Short-Term Intensive Workshop for Innovating Technology-Enhanced English Teaching Methods

context.prior_knowledge: Requirement of intermediate theoretical background and practical experience
context.additional_context: Aims to innovate English teaching methodologies in science fields by providing technology-integrated educational experiences in VR-based simulation environments.

learning_goals: Participants can improve the design of science-focused English lessons using three or more technology integration strategies with VR-based simulation tools.
Participants can develop one or more student-centered English lesson modules utilizing open educational resources (OER) in a BYOD environment.
Participants can enhance their ability to apply technology-based teaching methods by 20% or more through a digital literacy competency assessment.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
